1.0.name: wordpress/post-content-xmlrpc
1.0.description:
Using Post Content XMLRPC plugin admin is allowed to post the content to remote sites from one single place. This plugin uses the cURL & XMLRPC service. This plugin adds the post in default category. You can add post tags while adding the post.

Plugin Requirements other than Wordpress :

1.Please verify Current site & remote sites has CURL enabled. 2.Please verify remote site has XMLRPC enabled from Settings >> Writing.

This plugin extends the functionality/usability shown on : http://www.wprecipes.com/post-on-your-wordpress-blog-using-php
